ch.nolix.system.application

Class Client<C extends Client<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.system.application.Client<C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Abortable, OptionalSignable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DialogClient, StandardClient

    public abstract class Client<C extends Client<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements OptionalSignable, Abortable

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates new client that will connect to the given application.

      protected Client(java.lang.Object object, java.lang.String ip, int port, java.lang.String targetApplication) 
      protected Client(java.lang.String ip, int port, java.lang.String targetApplication)
      Creates new client that will connect to the given target application on the given port on the machine with the given ip.
      protected Client(java.lang.String ip, int port, java.lang.String targetApplication, Session<?> initialSession)
      Creates new client that has the given initial session and will connect to the given target application on the given port on the machine with the given ip.
